Class Screens

    • chooseTopic

      public static void chooseTopic​(CurriculumList curriculumList, Curriculum curriculumObject, Course courseObject) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      chooseTopic sets out instructions in dealing with a chosen Topic object
      Parameters:
      curriculumList - - reference to the curriculumList where the topic object belongs to.
      curriculumObject - - reference to the curriculumObject where the topic object belongs to.
      courseObject - - reference the courseObject where the topicObject belongs to.

      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      public static void curriculumScreen​(CurriculumList curriculumList) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
